Article Title: Nestor Cortes' injury returns at worst possible time creating uncertainty in Brewers' rotation
Article Text:
Nestor Cortes' injury returns at worst possible time creating uncertainty in Brewers' rotation (Image Source: X)

Nestor Cortes immediate impact of elbow strain

Nestor Cortes's injury history and future outlook

The Milwaukee Brewers issued a statement declaring that Nestor Cortes, their starting pitcher, has been put on the 15-day injured list owing to a strain in his left elbow flexor. The move questions the depth of the pitching staff and also Nestor Cortes' health, more so considering the history of similar injuries.The Brewers put left-hander Nestor Cortes on the 15-day injured list on April 6, 2025, because of a left elbow flexor strain . It is the second time in eight months that Nestor Cortes has suffered this specific injury; he was previously out due to the same reason playing for the New York Yankees in September 2024. Despite that, he was available again in time to serve during the World Series.Nestor Cortes has had a rollercoaster ride of a season in terms of ups and downs. He miserably failed in his debut for the Brewers, giving up eight runs, five of which were home runs, over two innings against his old team, the Yankees. He returned with vengeance in his second appearance, throwing six shutout innings and taking the Brewers to a nail-biting 1-0 win against the Cincinnati Reds.Nestor Cortes' chronic elbow problem is concerning. His previous IL stint back in September of 2024 was also attributed to the same flexor strain. Even in light of all these, Brewers assistant GM Matt Kleine sounded optimistic by describing the current injury as unlikely to be a "long-term issue."During his career, Cortes has recorded 34-22 with a 3.88 ERA in 137 games. The Brewers bullpen has been significantly damaged by the early injury troubles of the season. Nestor Cortes is the seventh rotation starter to have gone onto the injured list, proving the team's ongoing issue of keeping healthy in the rotation.While the Brewers endure these missteps, attention will be given to their roster and seeing that guys like Cortes are given whatever care they must have to again get back into top form. Team officials, along with the fans, will be watching eagerly for his comeback, hoping he can come back swiftly and fully in action on the mound.Also Read: “Going To Learn A Lot”: Brewers’ Nestor Cortes Reflects On Tough Game Against New York Yankees
Article Summary: Nestor cortes has been put on the 15-day injured list with a left elbow flexor strain. It is the second time in eight months that he has suffered this specific injury. The brewers assistant gm matt kleine sounded optimistic by describing the current injury as unlikely to be a "long-term issue"

Article Title: “Naturally hate him”: Pat McAfee didn’t shy away from connecting Travis Kelce’s public image and his relationship with Taylor Swift
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Taylor Swift’s influence shines as Travis Kelce makes $3.3 million donation to homeless youth in Kansas City

Pat McAfee opened up on Travis Kelce’s generosity while acknowledging Taylor Swift’s impact on his growing philanthropic presence. While Travis Kelce continues to make headlines as a Kansas City Chiefs superstar and a three-time Super Bowl champion, it’s his growing off-field legacy that’s earning admiration this week—one that’s closely tied to his high-profile relationship with Taylor Swift . The NFL tight end has made a powerful philanthropic move, donating $3.3 million toward a transitional home for homeless youth in Kansas City, and some are crediting Swift’s influence as part of the inspiration behind it.The 6,500-square-foot facility, built in partnership with the nonprofit Foster Love, will offer more than just a roof over young people’s heads. Designed with heart and purpose, the home includes six bedrooms, five bathrooms, a game room, a study area, a spacious kitchen, and outdoor features like a fire pit and garden. But more importantly, it will provide mentorship, education, and a sense of belonging to youth who are often overlooked.Pat McAfee, speaking on his ESPN show, didn’t shy away from connecting Kelce’s public image and his relationship with Swift to this generous gesture. “There are people that just naturally hate him because he's very popular, very famous,” McAfee said. “Especially now because he's dating the most popular and famous person in the world in Taylor Swift.”He emphasized that Kelce’s decision to invest in social good over luxury or personal gain should be celebrated: “So him giving back, making the world a better place, I think should be chatted about.” McAfee added, “He could have bought something for himself or his family but instead wanted to give it back to society.”Kelce’s charity work isn’t new. Through his 87 & Running Foundation, established in 2015, he’s long championed programs for underserved youth, focusing on education, leadership, and athletics. However, this latest donation feels like a deeper evolution—both in scale and intention.Also Read: Bon Iver’s Justin Vernon calls Taylor Swift’s ‘Exile’ performance an ‘out of body’ moment during Eras Tour reflection Swift’s presence seems to align with this transformation. Known for her own extensive philanthropic efforts, including recent multimillion-dollar disaster relief donations, she brings with her a culture of giving and a massive spotlight—one that may be encouraging Kelce to broaden his impact.In the end, this isn’t just about a donation—it’s about a growing legacy shaped by love, leadership, and the desire to give back.
Article Summary: Travis kelce donated $3.3 million toward a transitional home for homeless youth in kansas city. The 6,500-square-foot facility will offer more than just a roof over young people’s heads. It will provide mentorship, education, and a sense of belonging to youth who are often overlooked.

Article Title: NFL Rumors: Aaron Rodgers reportedly prefers Vikings over Steelers despite Tomlin connection
Article Text:
Image via Imagn Images

Aaron Rodgers is weighing legacy versus fit as he eyes the NFC North for one last run

Vikings offer a legacy move, but JJ McCarthy may be in the way



Aaron Rodgers is once again at the center of NFL offseason drama, and this time, his decision could reshape the balance of power in the NFC North. While the Pittsburgh Steelers are considered the frontrunners in the race to land the four-time MVP, fresh reports suggest that Rodgers has his sights set elsewhere—specifically, the Minnesota Vikings.Although Rodgers has been linked to Mike Tomlin’s Steelers in what many believe would be a natural pairing, the quarterback reportedly finds himself drawn to the Vikings’ high-powered offense and young talent. The franchise finished 14-3 last season and boasts superstar wideout Justin Jefferson, whose precise routes have been described as “Picasso with cleats.”Rodgers has long admired Minnesota’s head coach Kevin O’Connell, describing him as a “synchronized QB whisperer.” Their mutual respect dates back years, and Rodgers seems to see something special in this Vikings system. “I’ve always respected Mike [Tomlin] from afar,” Rodgers acknowledged in December, “but Minnesota’s built different.”While Rodgers appears to favor a Minnesota move, the team’s recent decision to draft quarterback JJ McCarthy may block his path. O’Connell is playing it cool, stating, “We’re rolling with JJ… unless he faceplants.” Translation? Rodgers’ shot at wearing purple and gold may depend entirely on whether the rookie struggles out of the gate.Still, for Rodgers, who famously values self-reflection, this may be about more than schemes and stats. “Authenticity is everything. You want to be proud of the person in the mirror,” he once said. And perhaps Minnesota, a franchise ready to contend but still searching for its next legendary QB, offers that clarity.Over in Pittsburgh, Tomlin is reportedly all-in. Multiple meetings, extended calls, and an open-ended approach show his willingness to bring Rodgers into the fold. But with Mason Rudolph re-signed and wide receiver George Pickens waiting for a consistent QB1, the Steelers may not feel like the perfect match.Also Read: Aaron Rodgers is the NFL’s problem child — and the league just can’t seem to let go Their $32.9 million in cap space could be stretched to meet Rodgers' rumored $40 million price tag—but does Rodgers see them as contenders or pretenders? At 41, he’s not chasing contracts—he’s chasing legacy. And if legacy means owning the NFC North one more time, then don’t be surprised if Rodgers rides off in purple instead of black and gold.
Article Summary: Aaron rodgers is weighing legacy versus fit as he eyes the nfc north for one last run. Rodgers has long admired minnesota’s head coach kevin o’connell, describing him as a “synchronized qb whisperer” the vikings’ recent decision to draft quarterback jj mccarthy may block his path.

Article Title: “Nobody likes this guy”: Gary Bettman’s awkward interaction with Alex Ovechkin’s wife fuels criticism across social media
Article Text:
Alex Ovechkin continues his pursuit of Wayne Gretzky’s all-time goal record, scoring his 892nd career goal despite the Washington Capitals’ 5-1 loss to the Carolina Hurricanes. The hockey world watches as Ovechkin nears Gretzky’s milestone, while a celebratory moment with NHL Commissioner Gary Bettman sparks online criticism.

Awkward, cringeworthy handshake between Anastasia Shubskaya and Gary Bettman

One of the most compelling narratives in the NHL right now is Alex Ovechkin’s pursuit of Wayne Gretzky’s all-time goal record. On Wednesday night, despite the Washington Capitals falling 5-1 to the Carolina Hurricanes, Ovechkin was the lone bright spot for his team. The 39-year-old sniper unleashed a powerful shot from the high slot in the second period, beating goaltender Frederik Andersen and notching the 892nd goal of his storied career. Alex Ovechkin's wife shared a celebratory high-five with Capitals owner Ted Leonsis and then attempted to include NHL Commissioner Gary Bettman in the momentAlex Ovechkin, a 13-time NHL All-Star and three-time Hart Trophy winner, continues to edge closer to one of the greatest milestones in hockey history. With 892 goals under his belt, he's now just two away from tying Wayne Gretzky’s iconic all-time goal record and three from standing alone at the top. As the countdown narrows, the hockey world watches with anticipation, ready to witness history in the making.“If he breaks my record, I will be the first guy to stand there and shake his hand," Wayne Gretzky told reporters of Ovechkin’s chase for history. “I think it is great for our sport. I am proud of what I have accomplished. I know what I did was really hard, but I think it will only be positive for the game if he can break the record.”Following Alex Ovechkin’s latest goal—bringing him within one of his 14th 40-goal season—his wife, Anastasia Shubskaya, was visibly excited in the stands. She shared a celebratory high-five with Capitals owner Ted Leonsis and then attempted to include NHL Commissioner Gary Bettman in the moment. What followed was an awkward, cringeworthy handshake that quickly caught fans’ attention. Given Bettman’s already unpopular status among many NHL supporters, the uncomfortable exchange only fueled more criticism of him across social media.“‘Celly’ that man barely shook her hand,” one fan wrote. “Bettman try to care challenge impossible,” another joked. “The second she looked away his face got so sour,” added a third fan. “What an awkward celebration ..,” one mocked. “Gary like who dis ,” another one quipped.“Nobody likes this guy ,” remarked one fan.Also Read: “An idiot jumping around”: Alex Ovechkin’s epic response to Don Cherry’s criticism resurfaces as he nears Gretzky’s goal record Fans wasted no time reacting online, with many mocking the awkward moment and using it as yet another reason to criticize Bettman. Social media lit up with sarcastic remarks and memes, as users wisecracks about Bettman’s lack of charm even during a celebration.
Article Summary: Alex ovechkin scored his 892nd goal of his career on wednesday night. The washington capitals lost 5-1 to the carolina hurricanes. His wife shared a celebratory high-five with capitals owner ted leonsis. She then attempted to include nhl commissioner gary bettman in the moment.

Article Title: "Tried to break up with her": Dwyane Wade once spoke about wanting to end things with Gabrielle Union as another woman was pregnant with his child
Article Text:
Image via Dia Dipasupil/FilmMagic

Dwyane Wade and Gabrielle Union's relationship went through a rocky patch before they got engaged

Dwyane Wade on Telling Gabrielle Union He Was Having A Kid With Another Woman | CLUB SHAY SHAY

Dwyane Wade, the NBA legend, recently went through a tough battle against cancer, and his wife, famous actress, Gabrielle Union , stayed by his side all through it. While the two have been married for more than a decade now, there was a time when their relationship had become difficult to manage. In 2023, Dwyane Wade appeared on Shannon Sharpe’s Club Shay Shay podcast and opened up about what happened when he had a child with another woman.According to Dwyane Wade, apparently in 2013, he had hit a rough patch with his now wife, Gabrielle Union, when they were dating. This had caused the couple to take a break in their relationship.It was during their break that Dwyane Wade fathered a son with his long time friend Aja Metoyer. However, things became rocky when Gabrielle Union came back into Dwyane Wade’s life.Dwyane Wade said, "I tried to break up with her, ‘Hey, you know things has been bad lately. We've been having some distance in our relationship anyway.' Like I tried all that. She kept showing up.”But all worked out well for Dwyane Wade and Gabrielle Union as the two ended up getting engaged in December 2013, one month after his son with Aja Metoyer, Xavier, was born in November 2013.However, it seems like the couple faced some problems in their marriage. Dwyane Wade spoke about his marriage to Gabrielle Union and said, “It hasn’t been perfect, it will never be perfect but that was nine years ago.”He added, “We go to therapy, we’ve had shouts about it, we’ve had regular conversations about, and so it’s been something that going to be something that I have to work at and work on.”When Dwyane Wade spoke about this in 2023, he had not gone through one of the most painful experiences of his life - his cancer diagnosis . It was in December 2023 when he was first tested and later underwent a major kidney surgery.His wife, Gabrielle Union, became a huge source of strength during his battle with cancer and the couple has continued to be very much in love with each other even today. They continue to be one of the most popular couples in the world of sports and entertainment and are pretty happy with their lives as they raise their daughter together.Also Read: "I started feeling invisible": Dwyane Wade’s wife Gabrielle Union opens up about her unsettling Hollywood experiences in new documentary
Article Summary: Dwyane wade and gabrielle union's relationship went through a rocky patch before they got engaged in december 2013. In 2023, dwyane wade appeared on shannon sharpe’s club shay shay podcast and opened up about what happened when he had a child with another woman. He said, “it hasn’t been perfect, it will never be perfect but that was nine years ago”

Article Title: "Josh Allen is blessed": Hailee Steinfeld glows in red and fans couldn’t help but gush over her magic
Article Text:
Credit: X and Instagram/hailee steinfeld

Josh Allen enjoys glamorous offseason with fiancée Hailee Steinfeld amid her film promotions



Buffalo Bills quarterback Josh Allen appears to be relishing every moment of the offseason—not just on the golf course, but also on the red carpet alongside his fiancée, Hollywood star Hailee Steinfeld . The couple, who got engaged in November 2024 after months of quiet speculation, is now enjoying their time in the spotlight as Steinfeld promotes her latest movie, Sinners .Recently, Josh Allen and Hailee Steinfeld made headlines by attending both the Mexico and New York City premieres of the upcoming thriller. Directed by Ryan Coogler—renowned for his collaborations with Michael B. Jordan in Black Panther, Fruitvale Station, and the Creed series—the film is set to hit theaters on April 18. Starring Steinfeld and Jordan, Sinners is already generating significant buzz, and Allen is proudly supporting his fiancée every step of the way.At the U.S. premiere in NYC, the couple turned heads with their elegant arrival at the afterparty. While Allen maintained a cool, understated presence, it was Steinfeld who stole the show with her fashion-forward look. In a recent Instagram post, the 28-year-old actress showcased a sultry yet sophisticated outfit—a halter bodycon maxi dress featuring corset detailing that highlighted her curves in all the right ways. Her glamorous Hollywood waves paired with a bold dark red lip channeled old-school elegance and drew admiration from fans and fashion watchers alike.During this downtime from the gridiron, Allen has also been enjoying a lighter side of life. The NFL MVP was recently seen golfing with Nick "Fat Perez" Stubbe, a well-known YouTube personality. In a fun moment caught on camera, Allen vowed to dedicate his first touchdown celebration of the season to Stubbe—adding a playful twist to what’s otherwise expected to be a high-stakes 2025 campaign.The chemistry between Allen and Steinfeld continues to captivate fans. While Allen gears up for another intense NFL season, Steinfeld is busy stealing scenes on and off the screen. Their public appearances have been drawing attention not only for their star power but also for their unwavering support of each other’s careers.With Sinners set for release in just days, and Steinfeld making waves with her standout promotional looks, one thing is certain—Josh Allen may be the MVP on the field, but off it, he’s clearly playing for love.Also Read: Aaron Rodgers’ quiet stance reportedly signals a shift away from Pittsburgh Steelers toward Minnesota Vikings
Article Summary: Josh allen and hailee steinfeld got engaged in november 2024. The couple is enjoying their time in the spotlight as steinfeld promotes her latest movie, sinners. The nfl mvp was recently seen golfing with nick "fat perez" stubbe.

Gujarat Titans captain Shubman Gill and Sunrisers Hyderabad skipper Pat Cummins.

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Do you believe that team form will play a crucial role in today's match? No Yes

Jos Buttler Exclusive Interview: I owe Jayawardene for letting me open in T20

Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH) face Gujarat Titans (GT) at the Rajiv Gandhi International Stadium in Hyderabad today, desperate to halt a three-match losing streak.Despite an explosive 286-run start to the IPL season, SRH’s all-out attacking approach has backfired, with scores of 190, 163, and 120 in the subsequent games.Their batting stars, including Travis Head, Ishan Kishan, and Heinrich Klaasen, have failed to deliver consistently, and the bowling unit — led by skipper Pat Cummins — has struggled, with high economy rates and no bowler completing four overs in every match.Also See: GT vs SRH Live Score, IPL 2025 Currently at the bottom of the points table, SRH risk slipping out of playoff contention.In contrast, the Gujarat Titans are gaining momentum, buoyed by a big win over RCB. With a strong top order of Gill, Sudharsan and Buttler, and finishers like Rutherford and Tewatia, they look balanced.While Rabada’s absence is a blow, options like Coetzee or Phillips could fill the gap. Titans also boast a more disciplined bowling attack, giving them an edge.Hyderabad’s red soil pitch promises bounce and carry, but it slows as the ball ages. Despite average boundaries (69m, 67m, 79m), on average 24 sixes are hit per game. It’s a dry, grassless, firm surface. Batting first is ideal, as past matches saw 200+ totals in all innings.Travis Head, Abhishek Sharma, Ishan Kishan, Nitish Kumar Reddy, Heinrich Klaasen (wk), Aniket Verma, Abhinav Manohar, Pat Cummins (c), Simarjeet Singh, Harshal Patel, Mohammed Shami– Zeeshan Ansari/Adam ZampaSai Sudharsan, Shubman Gill (c), Jos Buttler (wk), Shahrukh Khan, Rahul Tewatia, Arshad Khan, Rashid Khan, Ravisrinivasan Sai Kishore, Mohammed Siraj, Prasidh Krishna, Ishant Sharma– Sherfane Rutherford/Washington SundarPat Cummins (c), Ishan Kishan (wk), Atharva Taide, Abhinav Manohar, Aniket Verma, Sachin Baby, Heinrich Klaasen, Travis Head, Harshal Patel, Kamindu Mendis, Wiaan Mulder, Abhishek Sharma, Nitish Kumar Reddy, Mohammed Shami, Rahul Chahar, Adam Zampa, Simarjeet Singh, Zeeshan Ansari, Jaydev Unadkat and Eshan Malinga.Shubman Gill (C), Jos Buttler, B. Sai Sudharshan, Shahrukh Khan, Mohammed Siraj, Prasidh Krishna, Rahul Tewatia, Rashid Khan, Nishant Sindhu, Mahipal Lomror, Kumar Kushagra, Anuj Rawat, Manav Suthar, Washington Sundar, Gerald Coetzee, Mohmmad Arshad Khan, Gurnoor Singh Brar, Sherfane Rutherford, R. Sai Kishore, Ishant Sharma, Jayant Yadav, Glenn Phillips, Kareem Janat, Kulwant Khejroliya.SRH and GT have faced each other 4 times, and GT hold the upper hand, winning 3 matches. SRH won their first encounter in 2022, but after that GT have won three consecutive matches.Their last scheduled match between the two teams in Hyderabad was abandoned without a ball bowled due to rain.As per Accuweather, Hyderabad is expected to be incredibly hot with temperatures slated to hit as high as 38 degrees Celsius. The conditions are expected to remain hot for the 7:30pm start, with temperatures hovering over 30 degrees Celsius.
Article Summary: Sunrisers hyderabad (srh) face gujarat titans (gt) at the rajiv gandhi international stadium in hyderabad today. Currently at the bottom of the points table, srh risk slipping out of playoff contention. In contrast, the gujarat titans are gaining momentum, buoyed by a big win over rcb.

Article Title: "I can't take it": Joe Burrow makes a rare appearance after a long time and now fans are panicking about it
Article Text:
Image via Cooper Neill/Getty

Joe Burrow gets spotted at an NBA game after a long time and fans are losing their minds over it



Joe Burrow is a fan favourite due to the way he supported his Cincinnati Bengals’ teammates



Joe Burrow, one of the most talented and popular players in the Baltimore Ravens , mostly keeps himself away from the spotlight. Though the NFL star has a loyal fan base, he likes to maintain a low profile. Recently, clips of Joe Burrow attending an NBA game have gone viral and fans are beyond excited about them, since its a rare glimpse of the NFL star.As per the fan clips that have gone viral, it seems like Joe Burrow attended a game of the Los Angeles Lakers with his close friends. The NFL star seemed to be lowkey as he looked handsome in a black sweatshirt that he paired with black pants.But this was enough for fans to go insane over his pictures and videos. A fan took to X and posted, “THE HAIR THE SWEATER THE PUSHED UP SLEEVES GOOD GOD 🤯 “, while another fan wrote, “Woke up to this. Good morning indeed 🤭”A third fan wrote, “also btw this video is wild because whoever filmed it is clearly only like 5 people away from him i know joe saw them filming like i would be so mortified if i got caught filming him that close to him kskwkdkd”.Another user posted, “cutest side profile ever someone sedate me immediately”, while a fifth fan noted, “he’s so beautiful i can’t take it”.Recently, Joe Burrow also posted a rare update on his social media. The NFL star posted Golden State Warriors’ Jimmy Butler’s Instagram story.The Instagram story shows that Joe Burrow bumped into Jimmy Butler while the NBA star was working out and the two shook hands.In the last few months, NFL star, Joe Burrow has continued to be in the news due to the impressive performance he recorded at the 2024 season of the NFL.Many fans have blamed his fan, the Cincinnati Bengals, for not being able to use Joe Burrow to his full potential.Recently, Joe Burrow also supported his teammates and advocated for them to be offered better pay.This led to Ja’Marr Chase and Tee Higgins signing expensive deals with the Cincinnati Bengals as a part of their contract extensions.While NFL star, Joe Burrow, likes to maintain a low profile, a few months ago, there were speculations that he is dating model Olivia Ponton.However, both Joe Burrow and Olivia Ponton remained silent about the rumours and have never been spotted together. As of today, Joe Burrow remains officially single, even though he likes to keep his personal life far away from his professional life.Also Read: Derrick Henry’s new workout video goes viral but fans are focused on someone else in the video
Article Summary: Joe burrow is one of the most talented and popular players in the baltimore ravens. Recently, clips of joe burrow attending an nba game have gone viral and fans are beyond excited about them. The nfl star posted golden state warriors’ jimmy butler’s instagram story.

Article Title: Bill Belichick’s girlfriend Jordon Hudson celebrates her 24th birthday with a sweet tribute to his new UNC chapter
Article Text:
Credit: Getty Images

Inside Jordon Hudson’s 24th birthday bash and how she’s honoring Bill Belichick’s latest coaching move



Jordon Hudson ’s 24th birthday wasn’t just about cakes and candles—it became a heartfelt celebration of love, loyalty, and life’s unexpected journeys. The former college cheerleader and current partner of legendary NFL coach Bill Belichick used her special day to offer a unique tribute to the man who has stood beside her despite the headlines, criticism, and their 48-year age gap.On April 4, Jordon Hudson took to Instagram to showcase a thoughtful snapshot: a bouquet of red roses and a University of North Carolina basketball jersey with “Jordon” emblazoned above the number 24. It wasn’t just a birthday nod—it was a clever homage to her own age and Michael Jordan’s college legacy, all while acknowledging Belichick’s new beginning with the Tar Heels. The jersey symbolized more than a gift—it marked her deep-rooted support for Belichick as he transitions into his first-ever college football coaching role.It’s not the first time Hudson has publicly backed her partner. After facing online scrutiny over their relationship, she shared a bold message on Instagram in December 2024: "Nothing changed for us in 2024 except for 'public knowledge': yet somehow everything changed. Going strong. I can't wait to take punches for you in 2025. Keep swinging, Keyboard Warriors. Your illusion of righteousness only fuels my authenticity." Her statement echoed the kind of emotional resilience that often keeps high-profile relationships afloat.The pair's journey began in an unlikely setting—on a flight to Florida in February 2021. Hudson, then a college student with a passion for philosophy, had Belichick sign her “Deductive Logic” textbook. He penned a note that read, “Thanks for giving me a course on logic! Safe travels! Bill Belichick,” complete with Super Bowl win numbers. That simple exchange bloomed into a connection that, despite public skepticism, has only grown stronger.In February 2025, Jordon Hudson commemorated their four-year “meetiversary” with a post saying, “Happy Meetiversary @billbelichick — Cheers 🥂 to the fact that you still let me give you lengthy philosophical lectures four years later.” A slideshow accompanied the caption, featuring a touching photo of the couple holding hands during Super Bowl week in New Orleans.Her recent birthday post also included a stylish red beaded handbag by STAUD, inspired by the Year of the Snake—a nod to Hudson’s creative side. Fans have often seen glimpses of her DIY flair, whether it’s bedazzling a UNC sweatshirt or crafting a rhinestone lobster purse to raise awareness for Maine fishermen.While Belichick is gearing up for his new role at UNC, their life together continues to reflect a delicate balance between legacy and love. From philosophical musings to beachside antics—like the viral "Billates" workout where Hudson was seen balanced on Belichick’s feet—the couple is redefining what it means to navigate fame and age differences with grace, humor, and authenticity.Also Read: Aaron Rodgers left more than memories for Olivia Munn — a haunting truth she can’t shake Their story proves that sometimes, love takes off in the most unexpected places—like 30,000 feet in the air—and lands in a partnership that neither logic nor judgment can define.
Article Summary: Jordon hudson celebrated her 24th birthday on april 4 with a thoughtful tribute to bill belichick. The university of north carolina basketball jersey with "jordon" emblazoned above the number 24 was a clever homage to her own age and michael jordan’s college legacy.

Article Title: Japanese Grand Prix 2025 Weather Update: Wet conditions expected at Suzuka – good or bad news?
Article Text:
Image credit: Formula 1/Twitter

A rainy race day on the cards at the Japanese Grand Prix After Australia, another wet and wild race is on the cards at the Japanese Grand Prix on Sunday. Red Bull’s Max Verstappen secured pole position on Saturday, setting the stage for the final race at Suzuka. According to the weather forecast, there are chances of rain during the race, which has made his fans even more confident about his victory. However, it's difficult to predict what will happen at the Suzuka Circuit , as it’s not just Verstappen in the race—McLaren’s Lando Norris is also a strong contender and is high on confidence after winning the rain-affected race in Melbourne.The race will start at 2 p.m. local time. It will take place over 53 laps of the 5.807-kilometre Suzuka Circuit and is expected to last around 2 hours.According to the weather forecast shared by the FIA, showers are likely in the morning, which could dampen the dry grass. The temperature is expected to be higher than on the first two days, hovering around 17 degrees Celsius. After the morning showers, it may become a bit cloudy, with slightly reduced chances of rain during the race. However, the timing of the rain is unpredictable, and track conditions could fluctuate between wet and dry throughout the day.The storm and rain in Australia had overturned race strategies for many, resulting in multiple incidents and crashes on the wet track. In Japan, there's more to worry about than just the track. The frequent grass fires during practice sessions and qualifying race left drivers frustrated due to multiple red flags and the loss of precious time. Drivers may lose sleep over the weather prediction for Sunday, but many Formula 1 fans are expecting a more unpredictable and exciting race.As the official X (formerly Twitter) handle of Formula 1 asked the fans, “Anyone packed an umbrella?” many expressed their desire to see a wet race. One fan tweeted, “That would make things interesting.” Another wrote, “I would actually like to see a wet race. More chances to see Max coming out on top.” “Oh, exciting... Australia repeat?” asked a fan. One fan also said sarcastically, “At least the grass won’t burn.” Another comment read, “What’s with F1 scheduling races on every rainy weekend? Get it together, FIA.”Also Read: Grass Fires at the Japanese Grand Prix: Causes, concerns and why current efforts aren't enough Many, including Lewis Hamilton and Oscar Piastri, struggled in the rain-hit season opener in Melbourne. Whether Max Verstappen will overpower Norris again with a magical lap in the Sunday race remains to be seen.
Article Summary: A rainy race day on the cards at the japanese grand prix on sunday. Red bull’s max verstappen secured pole position on saturday, setting the stage for the final race at suzuka. According to the weather forecast, there are chances of rain during the race.

Article Title: Indian Idol 15 Winner: Manasi Ghosh lifts the trophy with a whopping cash prize of Rs 25 Lakhs and a brand new car
Article Text: Manasi Ghosh has officially won the hearts of millions as the crowned champion of Indian Idol Season 15 . With the glittering trophy in one hand and a cash prize of Rs 25 lakhs in the other, Manasi stood on that grand stage in disbelief. “It still hasn’t sunk in,” she admitted, beaming with joy. Manasi also won a brand new car .This victory is even more special when you look at where she started—Manasi was the runner-up in Super Singer Season 3. But she didn’t stop dreaming. She kept growing, kept pushing, and now, she’s finally arrived at her moment.One of the most touching highlights of the season came when her parents joined her on stage for a beautiful surprise. The audience got a glimpse into her childhood, her struggles, and the unbreakable bond she shares with her family. Fighting back tears, her parents recalled the hard times when Manasi stepped up to take on financial responsibilities. They proudly shared, “She’s promised to buy us many houses,” revealing the depth of her love and commitment to them.The show will remember Manasi for not only her singing prowess but also her witty questions to all the celebrity guests, which have been some of the major highlights of this season. The top 3 contestants who had secured the final spot were Sneha Shankar , Manasi Ghosh and Subhajit Chakraborty . Sneha secured the Runner-up spot and received a cheque of Rs 5 Lakhs. Apart from the prize money, the young singer also signed a contract with Bhushan Kumar 's prestigious label on the show.The grand finale had some amazing performances by the contestants and the judges as well. One of the performances that shall be most remembered would be the host Aditya Narayan's. Apart from the star -studded night, Badshah got emotional as he remembered Sidhu Moosewala.Season 15 was full of memorable moments, hosted by the ever-energetic Aditya Narayan and judged by the powerhouse trio Shreya Ghoshal , Vishal Dadlani, and Badshah. Special appearances by stars like Shilpa Shetty, Raveena Tandon, and Mika Singh added to the glitz and emotion.In the end, it wasn’t just about winning a title—it was about a dream fulfilled, a family honored, and a journey that inspired everyone watching.
Article Summary: Manasi ghosh was crowned champion of indian idol season 15. She won a cash prize of rs 25 lakhs and a brand new car. Her parents joined her on stage for a beautiful surprise. The show will remember manasi for not only her singing prowess but also her witty questions.

Article Title: 'Hanji.. yahi hai': Rishabh Pant fulfils Digvesh Rathi's long-awaited dream - WATCH
Article Text:
Image credit: BCCI/IPL

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

WATCH:

Bombay Sport Exchange Ep. 2: GroupM's Vinit Karnik on IPL's growth and emerging sports

NEW DELHI: Young spinner Digvesh Singh Rathi is making waves in IPL 2025 for two standout reasons — his impressive bowling performances and a unique action that mirrors mystery spinner Sunil Narine . Rathi delivered a composed and effective spell during Lucknow Super Giants ' 12-run win over Mumbai Indians. His figures of 1/21 in the high-scoring clash earned him the Player of the Match award.With Lucknow Super Giants gearing up to face Kolkata Knight Riders next, LSG skipper Rishabh Pant helped fulfill Rathi's dream of meeting his idol, Narine.In a video shared by LSG, Pant is seen walking alongside Narine during a practice session at Eden Gardens in Kolkata and introducing the two.“The great Rathi. The great Sunil Narine,” Pant says while bringing them together.Also See: IPL Live Score, SRH vs GT “Hanji.. yahi hai,” Pant tells Rathi, pointing towards Narine.After receiving the Player of the Match award, Rathi had shared: “I saw Sunil Narine bowl, and since then I’ve loved bowling."“I want to make my mindset more attacking, like Sunil Narine. The way he handles pressure situations, he stays calm there too. I also want to do that,” he said.Approximately five years ago, during open trials conducted by the Delhi and District Cricket Association (DDCA) for the Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy, Rathi faced a pivotal moment.After delivering a ball that was dispatched out of the ground by an established IPL player, he sought a replacement ball but was instead sidelined for the remainder of the trials, ultimately not making the shortlist.Undeterred by this setback, Rathi resolved to refine his bowling skills, focusing intensely on minimizing runs conceded. He immersed himself in local club and corporate matches around Delhi-NCR, where maintaining an economical bowling rate was crucial for continued selection and match fees.Emulating Narine, Rathi transformed his bowling style to prioritise accuracy and control, aiming to prevent boundaries and earn recognition for his disciplined approach.This dedication bore fruit when the Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) recognized his potential and included him in their squad for IPL 2025. Under the leadership of captain Rishabh Pant, Rathi has emerged as a reliable asset, delivering economical spells that have significantly contributed to the team's performance.
Article Summary: Young spinner digvesh singh rathi is making waves in ipl 2025. Rathi delivered a composed and effective spell during lucknow super giants'12-run win over mumbai indians. His figures of 1/21 in the high-scoring clash earned him the player of the match award.

Article Title: Not Rohit Sharma, not Suryakumar Yadav! Kapil Dev reveals who should captain Team India
Article Text:
Gautam Gambhir and Rohit Sharma (BCCI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Poll Who do you think should lead Team India in the white-ball formats after Rohit Sharma? Other Shubman Gill Suryakumar Yadav Hardik Pandya

Sai Sudharsan Exclusive Interview: 'The dream is to play Test cricket'

NEW DELHI: Team India have clinched back-to-back ICC titles — the T20 World Cup in 2024 and the ICC Champions Trophy in 2025 — and will now turn their attention to the next big assignments in 2027: the ICC ODI World Cup and the ICC World Test Championship. Both titles in the past year came under Rohit Sharma ’s captaincy, but with the 37-year-old’s future uncertain, it remains to be seen whether he will lead the team in 2027.With Rohit already retired from T20Is, the biggest question facing Indian cricket is: who takes over the leadership baton?Currently, Suryakumar Yadav is leading the T20I side, while Shubman Gill is serving as the vice-captain in ODIs.Also See: IPL Live Score, SRH vs GT However, 1983 World Cup-winning captain Kapil Dev has made his preference clear, backing Hardik Pandya to lead India in white-ball formats.“To me, Hardik Pandya is my white ball captain. There are many contenders for the post but Pandya is my choice,” Kapil said at an event.“Pandya is relatively young and can build a team around him for the next ICC events,” he added.Pandya is currently active only in white-ball formats for India, having last played a Test match over six years ago.“Ideally, Hardik should also play Test cricket and since he isn't playing, India will need multiple captains for the three formats,” Kapil said.
Article Summary: Team india have clinched back-to-back icc titles. The t20 world cup in 2024 and the icc champions trophy in 2025. Both titles came under rohit sharma ’s captaincy, but with the 37-year-old’s future uncertain, it remains to be seen whether he will lead the team in 2027.

Article Title: Jasprit Bumrah declared fit for Mumbai Indians, set to play against ...
Article Text:
File image of Jasprit Bumrah (Photo Credit: Mumbai Indians)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Who will make the bigger impact in the next MI match? Rohit Sharma Jasprit Bumrah

Mumbai Indians' head coach Mahela Jayawardene has confirmed that premier fast bowler Jasprit Bumrah is fit and ready for selection in Mumbai Indians' (MI) upcoming fixture of this Indian Premier League IPL ) season against Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) on Monday.Also See: IPL Live Score, SRH vs GT It will be Bumrah's first competitive appearance since suffering a back injury during the Sydney Test on the tour of Australia. He has since missed the ICC Champions Trophy, which India went on to win."He's available, he's training today, and should be available (for RCB game). He arrived last night, he had his sessions with NCA (now called as Centre of Excellence), and he's been handed over to our physios. He's bowling today (in the practice session), so all good," said Jayawardene in the pre-match press conference on Sunday.Bumrah's record in the IPL stands out, claiming 165 wickets across 133 matches for MI.Jayawardene also provided an update on Rohit Sharma's injury, as he was unable to participate in the team's 12-run loss against Lucknow Super Giants after sustaining a knee injury during a training session.“Ro (Rohit) looks good. He is going to bat today (in a training session) as well. It was just an unfortunate impact on his leg while batting. So it's not comfortable. We were travelling yesterday (Saturday), and he will have a hit today and then we will do an assessment on that,” he added.The news of Bumrah regaining full fitness and Rohit recovering from his injury comes as a boost for the five-time IPL champions, as they have managed only a single victory thus far in this IPL season.
Article Summary: Jasprit bumrah is fit and ready to play for mumbai indians against royal challengers bengaluru (rcb) on monday. It will be the premier fast bowler's first competitive appearance since suffering a back injury during the sydney test on the tour of australia. Mi head coach mahela jayawardene also provided an update on rohit sharma's injury.

Article Title: Watch: Hardik Pandya struggles to hold back emotions after Mumbai Indians' latest IPL defeat to LSG
Article Text:
Emotional Hardik Pandya (Photo Credit: X)

Poll Do you believe Mumbai Indians can bounce back in their next match? No, they will struggle Yes, they will recover

Bombay Sport Exchange Ep. 2: GroupM's Vinit Karnik on IPL's growth and emerging sports

NEW DELHI: Hardik Pandya couldn’t hide his disappointment as Mumbai Indians fell short in a thrilling IPL 2025 contest against Lucknow Super Giants . Despite delivering a career-best performance with the ball, the MI skipper was visibly emotional after the 12-run defeat at the Ekana Stadium in Lucknow.After the match, once the players had completed the customary handshakes, Pandya was seen isolating himself in a corner of the ground, clearly distraught. Cameras caught the emotional moment as the all-rounder seemed to be blaming himself for not being able to finish the chase in a game where Mumbai were in control for large parts.Watch:Pandya’s 5/36 (his first five-wicket haul in T20s) had earlier given MI hope as they restricted LSG to 203 for 8 after being asked to bowl.Also See: PBKS vs RR Live Score, IPL 2025 However, despite a fluent 67 by Suryakumar Yadav and contributions from Naman Dhir (32) and Tilak Varma (25), MI could only muster 191/5 in their 20 overs.In the final over, MI needed 22 runs.Pandya smashed a six off the first ball from Avesh Khan, but two crucial dot balls and a single on the fifth delivery left MI with no way back.The failure to find boundaries in the last two overs proved costly, especially after Shardul Thakur’s tight penultimate over.Earlier in the match, LSG rode on blistering half-centuries from Mitchell Marsh (60 off 31) and Aiden Markram (53 off 38) to get past 200.Pandya led a strong MI comeback by dismissing both top scorers and picking up five key wickets to stall LSG’s momentum.Still, the all-rounder’s valiant effort wasn’t enough.The heartbreak of a missed opportunity was written all over Pandya’s face as MI suffered yet another close defeat.His emotional reaction has since gone viral, with fans and experts expressing both support and concern for the MI skipper as he continues to carry the weight of expectations.
Article Summary: Mumbai indians lost by 12 runs to lucknow super giants in ipl 2025. Mi skipper hardik pandya was visibly emotional after the match. He was seen isolating himself in a corner of the ground, clearly distraught. Pandya's 5/36 was his first five-wicket haul in t20s.

Article Title: Who won yesterday's IPL match, CSK vs DC, PBKS vs RR: Yesterday IPL match results
Article Text:
BCCI/IPL Photo

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

CAPITALS RISE TO THE TOP

Poll Which match outcome surprised you the most on Saturday? Both were expected outcomes Rajasthan Royals thrashing Punjab Kings Delhi Capitals beating Chennai Super Kings

Bombay Sport Exchange Ep. 2: GroupM's Vinit Karnik on IPL's growth and emerging sports

IPL: Fleming admits batting woes after CSK's third straight defeat

RAJASTHAN ROLL OVER PUNJAB

Jos Buttler Exclusive Interview: I owe Jayawardene for letting me open in T20

Saturday served up a doubleheader delight for IPL fans. In the opening clash, Delhi Capitals extended their unbeaten streak in IPL 2025 with a 25-run victory over five-time champions Chennai Super Kings at the MA Chidambaram Stadium. Later in the evening, Rajasthan Royals produced a dominant performance, thrashing Punjab Kings by 50 runs at the Maharaja Yadavindra Singh International Cricket Stadium.Delhi Capitals climbed to the top of the IPL 2025 points table with a historic win at Chepauk, their first victory at the venue since 2010. Powered by a classy 77 from KL Rahul, who opened in place of the injured Faf du Plessis, DC posted a competitive 183/6. Chennai Super Kings, despite a valiant unbeaten 69 from Vijay Shankar, managed only 158/5 in response, handing Delhi a 25-run win.DC’s bowlers executed their plans to perfection on a surface that didn’t allow free stroke-play. Vipraj Nigam impressed with figures of 2/27, while the rest of the bowling unit chipped in, barring Mohit Sharma and Axar Patel.Mukesh Kumar gave DC the ideal start, removing Rachin Ravindra with a return catch off a leading edge. Mitchell Starc then trapped Ruturaj Gaikwad with a short ball that was pulled straight to deep square leg. Nigam joined the party by dismissing Devon Conway, and CSK’s powerplay ended at a shaky 46/3.With the pitch slowing down, DC kept Shivam Dube and Shankar in check. Dube eventually fell for 18 to Nigam, and Kuldeep Yadav struck with a googly to trap Ravindra Jadeja leg-before for two. Though Shankar was given a few lifelines—two dropped chances and a missed lbw—he broke a 28-ball boundary drought with a couple of crisp shots, bringing up his fifty off 43 balls.MS Dhoni, playing in front of his family, provided late fireworks with an unbeaten 30 off 26 balls, but the target proved too much as CSK suffered their second consecutive home loss. Yashasvi Jaiswal returned to form in style, scoring a fluent 67 to lead Rajasthan Royals to a commanding 50-run win over Punjab Kings at the Maharaja Yadavindra Singh International Cricket Stadium in Mullanpur.Jaiswal, who had struggled in his first three outings, struck three fours and five sixes in his 45-ball knock, sharing an 89-run opening stand with skipper Sanju Samson (38). Riyan Parag (43* off 25) and Shimron Hetmyer (20) provided the finishing touches as RR posted a daunting 205/4—the first 200-plus total at the venue in six matches.In reply, Punjab never recovered from the double blow inflicted by Jofra Archer in the first over. Archer dismissed Priyansh Arya with the first ball of the innings and sent back captain Shreyas Iyer with the last, finishing with 3/25.Despite a counterattacking 62 off 41 balls from Nehal Wadhera and a brisk 30 from Glenn Maxwell, Punjab’s chase crumbled. The pair added 88 runs before Maheesh Theekshana dismissed Maxwell, and Wanindu Hasaranga struck the next ball to remove Wadhera. Punjab eventually finished on 155/9, suffering their first loss of the season.
Article Summary: Delhi capitals beat chennai super kings by 25 runs. Rajasthan royals thrash punjab kings by 50 runs. Yashasvi jaiswal returns to form in style. Delhi capitals climb to the top of the ipl 2025 points table.

Article Title: IPL 2025: MS Dhoni, Vijay Shankar create unwanted records in CSK's sluggish chase against DC
Article Text:
Chennai Super Kings' MS Dhoni and Vijay Shankar (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Do you think MS Dhoni's early entry in the match made a difference in the outcome? No, the team was already in trouble Yes, it could have changed the momentum

Slowest 50s in IPL 2025 (by balls)

43 - V Shankar CSK vs DC in Chennai

in Chennai 42 - R Ravindra CSK vs MI in Chennai

40 - Y Jaiswal RR vs PBKS in Chandigarh

39 - L Livingstone RCB vs GT in Bengaluru

37 - R Gaikwad CSK vs RR in Guwahati

Bombay Sport Exchange Ep. 2: GroupM's Vinit Karnik on IPL's growth and emerging sports

NEW DELHI: Chennai Super Kings ' lack of urgency in a tricky chase cost them dearly as they slumped to a 25-run defeat against Delhi Capitals in their Indian Premier League 2025 clash at the MA Chidambaram Stadium on Saturday.Chasing 184, CSK were reeling at 74/5 in 10.4 overs when MS Dhoni walked in — his earliest entry in a full 20-over match since 2023. With 110 needed off 56 balls, he joined Vijay Shankar , who was on 24 off 23. The stage was set for a counterattack, but what followed was a sluggish and baffling passage of play.Despite their reputation as big-hitters, Dhoni and Shankar crawled to just 32 runs in the next 4.2 overs. Shankar eventually brought up his fifty in the 17th over off 43 balls — the slowest half-century of the season. Alarmingly, CSK now account for three of the four slowest fifties in IPL 2025 , raising concerns over the intent of their batters.Also See: SRH vs GT, IPL Live Score Dhoni, too, endured a forgettable outing. His first boundary — a six off Mukesh Kumar — came off the 19th ball he faced, the slowest any batter has taken to hit a boundary in this season. Though the duo added an unbeaten 84-run partnership, it came in 9.2 overs — far too passive to make an impact.Earlier, KL Rahul anchored Delhi’s innings with a classy 77 off 51 balls to take them to 183/6. With this win, DC remain unbeaten while CSK’s stuttering campaign continues.
Article Summary: Chennai super kings lost by 25 runs to delhi capitals in ipl 2025 clash. Ms dhoni walked in at 74/5 in 10.4 overs, his earliest entry in a full 20-over match since 2023. Dhoni and vijay shankar added 84 runs in 9.2 overs, the slowest half-century of the season.

Article Title: IPL 2025: Major blow for Sunrisers Hyderabad! Star pacer hospitalised, ruled out of Gujarat Titans clash
Article Text:
Shubman Gill and Pat Cummins (BCCI/IPL Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Bombay Sport Exchange Ep. 2: GroupM's Vinit Karnik on IPL's growth and emerging sports

Teams:

Gujarat Titans:

Gujarat Titans Impact Subs:

Sunrisers Hyderabad:

Sunrisers Hyderabad Impact Subs:

NEW DELHI Sunrisers Hyderabad have been dealt a major blow ahead of their IPL 2025 clash against Gujarat Titans , as star pacer Harshal Patel has been hospitalised due to illness.Captain Pat Cummins confirmed at the toss that Harshal will miss the match, with Jaydev Unadkat replacing him in the playing XI.Former India pacer Varun Aaron, currently part of the commentary panel, also confirmed the news of Harshal’s hospitalisation.The right-arm seamer has taken four wickets in four matches this season and has been a key figure in Sunrisers Hyderabad’s bowling attack.Also See: GT vs SRH Live Score, IPL 2025 "Happy to bat first. We want to be aggressive. It's a ground we like batting at, we scored 280 at this venue not so long ago. We need to play our best. Need to focus on our strengths. Harshal Patel misses as he is ill, Jaydev Unadkat comes in," Cummins sais during the toss.Gujarat Titans' skipper Shubman Gill won the toss and elected to bowl against Sunrisers Hyderabad.Gujarat Titans brought in off-spin all-rounder Washington Sundar in place of pacer Arshad Khan as Gill thought the black soil pitch might favour tweakers.Washington is making his debut for the Titans."We are going to bowl first. Looks like a slowish wicket, different from the previous two games as it's a black soil surface. Generally it's a good wicket. We have been playing well, need to adapt to the conditions as soon as possible. I think we had good memories in the past, we are continuing to have good fun. Washington comes in for Arshad Khan," Gill said.Shubman Gill (capt), Sai Sudharsan, Jos Buttler (wk), Rahul Tewatia, Shahrukh Khan, Rashid Khan, Washington Sundar, R Sai Kishore, Mohammed Siraj, Prasidh Krishna, Ishant Sharma.Sherfane Rutherford, Glenn Phillips, Anuj Rawat, Mahipal Lomror, Arshad KhanTravis Head, Abhishek Sharma, Ishan Kishan, Nitish Kumar Reddy, Heinrich Klaasen (wk), Aniket Verma, Kamindu Mendis, Pat Cummins (capt), Zeeshan Ansari, Jaydev Unadkat, Mohammed Shami.Abhinav Manohar, Sachin Baby, Simarjeet Singh, Rahul Chahar, Wiaan Mulder
Article Summary: Gujarat titans' skipper shubman gill won the toss and elected to bowl against sunrisers hyderabad. Harshal patel misses as he is ill, jaydev unadkat comes in. Off-spin all-rounder washington sundar makes his debut for the titans.

Article Title: Sanju Samson becomes most successful Rajasthan Royals captain in IPL history
Article Text:
Sanju Samson (Getty Images)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Most wins as RR captain (IPL)

32 - Sanju Samson (62 matches)

31 - Shane Warne (55 matches)

18 - Rahul Dravid (34 matches)

15 - Steven Smith (27 matches)

9 - Ajinkya Rahane (24 matches)

Poll How do you rate Sanju Samson's captaincy skills? Poor Average Good Excellent

Most consecutive wins as an IPL captain

10 - Gautam Gambhir (2014-15)

8 - Shane Warne (2008)

8 - Shreyas Iyer (2024-25)

7 - MS Dhoni (2013)

When will CSK legend MS Dhoni retire from IPL? Astrologer Greenstone Lobo predicts

NEW DELHI: Sanju Samson etched his name in Rajasthan Royals ’ history books on Saturday, becoming the franchise’s most successful captain with a commanding 50-run win over Punjab Kings in Indian Premier League 2025. The match, held at the Maharaja Yadavindra Singh International Cricket Stadium in Mullanpur, marked Samson’s 32nd victory as skipper — surpassing the legendary Shane Warne ’s 31 wins.Warne, who led RR to the title in the IPL's inaugural 2008 season, had 31 wins from 55 matches. Samson now has 32 from 62, cementing his legacy as the Royals' most prolific leader.The win also ended Punjab Kings captain Shreyas Iyer ’s impressive eight-match unbeaten run in the IPL. Yashasvi Jaiswal starred with the bat, smashing a 45-ball 67, and stitched an 89-run opening stand with Samson (38) to power Rajasthan to 205/4 — their highest total at the venue in six matches. Riyan Parag added a fiery unbeaten 43 off 25 balls.Also See: IPL Live Score, SRH vs GT Defending the total, Jofra Archer struck early with two wickets in the opening over and returned with figures of 3/25, earning the Player of the Match award. Despite a gritty 62 from Nehal Wadhera, Punjab Kings could only manage 155/9.Rajasthan’s bowling attack maintained control throughout, as Punjab suffered their first loss of the season. Interestingly, teams defending 170-plus totals have now succeeded nine times out of ten in T20s at Mullanpur, where Punjab have now lost five of six games.The Royals now look reinvigorated under Samson’s leadership, setting the tone for a strong campaign.
Article Summary: Sanju samson becomes rajasthan royals' most successful captain with 50-run win over punjab kings in indian premier league 2025. The match marked samson’s 32nd victory as skipper — surpassing the legendary shane warne ’s 31 wins. Warne, who led rr to the title in the ipl's inaugural 2008 season, had 31 wins from 55 matches.

Article Title: Virat Kohli imitates John Cena's iconic 'you can't see me' gesture - WATCH
Article Text: Virat Kohli delighted fans by dancing to John Cena’s theme song in a viral video alongside Tim David. Kohli discussed his strong bond with Rohit Sharma, emphasizing their mutual trust and collaboration, crucial in many of their match-winning performances for India. Up next, RCB face Mumbai Indians in a much-anticipated clash on Monday.
